text: O vy, veruyushchiye! Raskhoduyte luchsheye iz togo, chto vy zarabatyvayete, ili iz togo, chto daruyet vam zemlya. Ne zhertvuyte togo, ot chego by vy otkazalis' sami, yesli by vam eto predlozhili; a yesli by i vzyali, to tol'ko zakryv glaza. Znayte, chto Allakh bogat, i Yemu ne nuzhny vashi neiskrenniye blagodeyaniya. On dostoin slavy za to, chto napravlyayet vas k blagodeyaniyam i blagochestiyu
